players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out immediately."
You: "I have no information to share at the moment, but I urge everyone to keep an open mind and not jump to conclusions based on assumptions."

Diana: "I believe we should gather more information before making any hasty decisions. Let's try to work together and investigate further to ensure we make the right choice for the safety of our village."

Bob: "Diana, I understand wanting to be cautious, but I have definitive proof. As the detective, I investigated Alice and she is confirmed mafia. There's no more information to gather - we must vote Alice out now or we lose."

You: "I would like to remind everyone that making assumptions without concrete evidence can be dangerous for our village. We have lost a valuable member already and we don't want to make any hasty decisions based on speculation. Let us continue investigating and gathering information before making any..."
